doc.field: Binder of materials from the National Association of Hispanic Firefighters training conference, Dallas, 2007: Spadafora presented on "9/11 Lessons Learned" docs include conference program and hand-outs, which include a speaker from Shreveport's slides on Hurricane Katrina Lessons Learned; Spadafora's binder holds various reference materials (FDNY annual report FY2006, FDNY terrorism & disaster preparedness strategy 2007, FDNY strategic plan 2007-08, some AUMs, CIMS/incident management protocol, various notes/outlines and CDs of photos and Powerpoint). Thick binder labeled "WTC circulars": starts 9/21/01 with 0700 Incident Command Post Meeting summary and proceeds through 387 informally numbered pages to June 2002 (handwritten table of contents at front (Spadafora was designated FDNY Safety Officer for the entire Recovery Operation at WTC, which dated according to Spadafora Oct 2001-June 2002); pages include "WTC Command" reports (which include recovery reports among other matters), "WTC emergency project" bulletins from NYC Dept of Design & Construction (on health & safety protocols), staffing/admin memos, security, etc. Also has maps of "inner zone as of 11/5/01" "safety area where gear is needed at all times", "WTC Recovery Project: Memorial Service Logistics" (Oct 24, 2001). Loose papers in box include a certification by Spadafora re: retired FDNY member Jacob E. Schiavone recovery work at site (2007); news articles/tearsheets/FDNY orders, etc. about the recovery; also Rhonda Shearer's extended response to the "American Ground" stolen goods contention (2003-06). Art Science Research Laboratory (Shearer and Gould) proposed project "WTC Living History Project by the People Who Actually Ran Ground Zero." (2002). Set of about 20 color 8x11 official FDNY photos of Ground Zero re: "crane collapse" of Nov 24, 2001. Portrait photo of Spadafora. Photo of Spadafora with Roger Clemens. Cheap print-outs of various Ground Zero digital photos. Certificate of recognition from NYC of Spadafora's work on WTC-PHR Recovery Project 2006-07. A few snapshots of Spadafora with others in diner, with motorcyclist, with Brooke Shields. Photo from Times (2002) of saluting a dumpster truck, presumably with remains. Clipboards with various WTC safety and other related memos. 2 floppies re: operations (one labeled "demobilization plan"). 2 CDs of "Danny Boy" by Susan "Scarlett" Ryan. 4 VHS: Wolf Blitzer of May 30, 2002; Kristin Heather re: PSA/Asbestos; FDNY on the scene: May 1993 WTC disaster; unopened weapons of mass destruction/first reponder tape from Dept of Justice. Artifact: Jesus on crucifix (metal; "Victor 02" on back, presumably creator and date). (Includes digital formats, artifacts, video)
